name: Cabbage and Smoked Sausage Soup
author: Ludy Brinck
summary: Even kids who don't care for vegetable soup may enjoy this one. Very good flavor. Sometimes I use crushed tomatoes with garlic, onion, or basil now that they're available. Turkey smoked sausage is great in this recipe!
ingredients: 1 head cabbage, cored and coarsely chopped
⅓ cup uncooked long grain white rice
1 (15 ounce) can red beans, with liquid
directions: Heat the vegetable oil in a large pot over medium heat, and cook the onion until lightly browned
Place sausage in the pot, and pour in water
Mix in cabbage, carrots, celery, rice, beans, tomato sauce, and crushed tomatoes
Season with salt, bay leaf, and thyme
Reduce heat to low, and cook at least 1 hour, until vegetables are tender and rice is cooked
